sentences.sentence: In 1823 he left Italy for Greece, but the next year, worn out with the ardours of the campaign, he caught rheumatic fever and died at Missolonghi, mourned as a national hero by the Greeks.
sentences.translation: 1823年，他离开意大利前往希腊，但是第二年，他由于热心独立运动而劳累过度，染上了风湿病，终于在梅索朗·吉昂去世，成为希腊人所悼念的一位民族英雄。
